attributes.action: Provide proper and full answers to petitions posted on this site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent reply to the petition
"We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to replace the unfair Council Tax with a tax that is based on people's ability to pay, such as a local income tax." shown on this site. You have to search this yourself as urls are disallowed.

Is totally inadequate and can be summarized as "we disagree" without any substantive reasons or arguments. 1,564 people signed the petition and deserve a full and proper answer rather than something that sounds like it came from the script of Yes Minister.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
